expectedBehavior: Demonstrates loading and resuming sessions. Part 1 creates a new session and sends two messages — 'Previous messages' after each prompt shows only messages sent BEFORE that prompt (so after message 2, history shows only message 1). Part 2 resumes the session via loadSession and sends message 3 — 'Previous messages' should now show both messages 1 and 2. Part 3 loads an unknown session which creates fresh state. Should end with 'Demo Complete'.
requiredOutput: Agent handled unknown session (created fresh state)
